preamble.title: Preamble
preamble.content1: This personal data protection policy (hereinafter "Policy") aims to inform users of the www.cayennefit.fr website about how their personal data is collected and processed by CAYENNEFIT.
preamble.content2: CAYENNEFIT attaches great importance to protecting the privacy of its users and undertakes to process their personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and French "Data Protection" law.
preamble.content3: This policy explains what data we collect, why we collect it, how we use it and what your rights are regarding this data.
preamble.content4: By using our website, you accept the practices described in this data protection policy.

section1.title: Data controller
section1.content: CAYENNEFIT, company based in Escaudain (59124), is the controller of personal data collected on the www.cayennefit.fr website. For any questions regarding the processing of your personal data, you can contact us at contact@cayennefit.fr.

purposes.description: Respond to your questions and information requests
Analyze site usage to improve our services

section5.title: Data sharing
section5.content: Your personal data is not sold to third parties. It may only be shared in the following cases:

cases.title: Service providers

section5.commitment: We undertake to only share your data with trusted third parties and only when necessary to provide our services.

section6.title: Your rights
section6.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

rights.title: Right of access
rights.description: Obtain confirmation that your data is processed and access this data

rights.title: Right of rectification
rights.description: Correct or complete your inaccurate or incomplete data

rights.title: Right to erasure
rights.description: Request deletion of your data under certain conditions

rights.title: Right to restriction
rights.description: Limit the processing of your data in certain cases

rights.title: Right to portability
rights.description: Retrieve your data in a structured format and transmit it

rights.title: Right to object
rights.description: Object to the processing of your data in certain situations

howToExercise.title: How to exercise your rights
howToExercise.content: To exercise these rights, contact us at contact@cayennefit.fr with an identity document.
howToExercise.responseTime: We undertake to respond within a maximum period of one month.

section7.title: Data security
section7.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:

measures.title: Encryption
measures.description: Data encryption in transit and at rest

measures.title: Controlled access
measures.description: Limited access to data according to the need-to-know principle

measures.title: Staff training
measures.description: Regular training of our team on data protection

measures.title: Regular audits
measures.description: Periodic checks and audits of our security systems

authority.title: Supervisory authority
authority.name: Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés (CNIL)

section9.title: Policy update
section9.content: This policy may be updated to reflect changes in our practices or regulations. We will inform you of any significant changes.

article1.content4: CAYENNEFIT reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. The applicable Terms are those in force at the time of the order.
article1.content5: If one or more stipulations of these Terms are held to be invalid or declared as such, the other stipulations retain their full force and scope.

article2.title: Purpose
article2.content: These Terms aim to define the terms and conditions under which CAYENNEFIT sells luxury used vehicles, offers automotive consulting services and connects buyers and sellers.

article3.title: Definitions
article3.client: Customer/Buyer: Any natural or legal person making a purchase or using CAYENNEFIT services.
article3.vehicles: Vehicles: Luxury used vehicles, mainly Porsche brand, offered for sale by CAYENNEFIT.
article3.parties: Parties: CAYENNEFIT on one hand, and the Customer on the other hand.
article3.site: Site: The www.cayennefit.fr website and all its associated pages.

article4.title: Accessibility and Appointments
article4.content1_1: The vehicle catalog is accessible 24/7 on the www.cayennefit.fr website, subject to technical maintenance.
article4.content1_2: The information presented (photos, descriptions, prices) is given for information purposes and may be modified without notice.
article4.content1_3: CAYENNEFIT strives to maintain the accuracy of information but cannot guarantee the absence of errors or omissions.
article4.content1_4: In case of temporary unavailability of the site, CAYENNEFIT cannot be held responsible for the consequences of this unavailability.
article4.content2_1: Vehicle visits are by appointment only, made via the website or by phone.
article4.content2_2: Appointments are confirmed by email and can be modified or cancelled up to 24 hours before the scheduled time.
article4.content2_3: In case of unjustified absence at the appointment, CAYENNEFIT reserves the right to charge travel fees.
article4.content2_4: Visits take place in compliance with current health measures and safety rules.

article5.title: Personal data
article5.content1: CAYENNEFIT collects and processes Customer personal data in accordance with its data protection policy.
article5.content2: The data collected is necessary for order execution and customer relationship management. For more information, consult our Privacy Policy.
article5.content3: The Customer has the right to access, rectify, delete and port their personal data.
article5.content4: Data may be communicated to partners as part of service execution (delivery, financing).
article5.content5: CAYENNEFIT undertakes not to sell or rent personal data to third parties for commercial purposes.
article5.content6: Data is kept for the duration necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.
article5.content7: The Customer can exercise their rights by contacting CAYENNEFIT at contact@cayennefit.fr.
article5.content8: In case of dispute, the Customer can contact the CNIL (Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés).

article6.content2: Any reproduction, representation, modification or adaptation without express authorization from CAYENNEFIT is prohibited.
article6.content3: The trademarks and logos of automotive manufacturers mentioned remain the property of their respective owners.

article7.title: Orders and Sales
article7.content1: Any order implies full acceptance of these Terms by the Buyer.
article7.content2: Orders can be placed online via the website or directly in the showroom after vehicle visit.
article7.content3: CAYENNEFIT reserves the right to accept or refuse an order, particularly in case of prior dispute or payment default.
article7.content4: The sale is considered final after signing the sales contract and receipt of full payment.
article7.content5: A detailed sales contract is established for each transaction, mentioning the exact characteristics of the vehicle.

article8.title: Prices
article8.content1: Vehicle prices are indicated in euros including all taxes (TTC) on the website and may be modified without notice.
article8.content2: The applicable price is the one in force at the time of order confirmation.
article8.content3: Delivery, registration and insurance fees are not included in the displayed price unless otherwise stated.
article8.content4: Discounts may be granted according to vehicles and market conditions, at CAYENNEFIT's discretion.

article9.title: Payment terms
article9.content1: Payment is made in full at the time of signing the sales contract, except for special financing agreement.
article9.content3: In case of payment by check, vehicle delivery is only made after effective cashing of the check.

article10.title: Retention of ownership and transfer of risks
article10.content1: CAYENNEFIT retains ownership of the vehicle until full payment of the price, even in case of delivery.
article10.content2: The risks of loss and deterioration are transferred to the Buyer upon delivery of the vehicle.

article11.title: Delivery
article11.content1: Delivery can be carried out according to several modalities to be agreed with the Buyer:
article11.delivery2: Delivery to home or agreed location (fees according to distance)
article11.content3: Delivery times are given for information only and may vary according to logistical constraints.

article12.title: Right of withdrawal
article12.content1: In accordance with legal provisions in force, the Buyer does not have a right of withdrawal for the purchase of used vehicles.
article12.content2: However, CAYENNEFIT may, commercially and according to circumstances, examine requests for exchange or trade-in.

article13.title: Responsibilities
article13.content1: CAYENNEFIT undertakes to provide vehicles conforming to descriptions and in good working order.
article13.content2: CAYENNEFIT's liability is limited to the vehicle purchase price and cannot include indirect damages.
article13.content3: The Buyer acknowledges having checked the vehicle's condition before signing the sales contract.
article13.content4: CAYENNEFIT cannot be held responsible for the use of the vehicle after delivery.

article14.title: Legal warranty
article14.content1: Vehicles sold benefit from the legal warranty of conformity and warranty against hidden defects.
article14.content2: A commercial warranty may be offered depending on vehicles, with specific conditions detailed in the contract.
article14.content3: Warranty interventions must be reported as soon as possible and carried out by approved professionals.

article15.title: Modification and termination
article15.content1: CAYENNEFIT reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time, the new conditions applying to subsequent orders.
article15.content2: In case of substantial modification, Customers will be informed by any appropriate means.
